Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: piaylit/c pimarturoc: Gewrgioc piremzahim: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: O athlete and martyr: Abba George Muzahim: that He may forgive us our sins.
